annotations.annotation: Authorized changes to Chapter ENV.01 to add requirement that individuals be at least 12-years of age, clarifying the time frame for permits and seasons, and to clarify other language. These changes are: amending Section ENV.01.08(a) to create subsection (1) and a new subsection (2); amending Section ENV.01.08(b); amending Section ENV.01.08(c) to create a new subsection (1) and subsection (2); amending Section ENV.01.08(h); amending 21.9 (A)(2) and (3); amending Section ENV.01.09(b)(1), (2) and (3); amending Section ENV.01.16(a)(1); and amending 21.21 (B)(2)(a).
